Package sharedRegions

Class RefereeSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • sharedRegions.RefereeSite
  • public class RefereeSite
extends java.lang.Object
    Referee Site. It is responsible for maintaining the state and managing the actions of the referee. It is implemented as an implicit monitor. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. There are no internal synchronization points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      RefereeSite​(GeneralRepos repos)
      Instantiation of the referee site.

    • Method Detail

      • getnGames

        public int getnGames()
        Get the number of games played.
        Returns:
        number of games played

      • getEndOfMatch

        public boolean getEndOfMatch()
        Get the end of the match.
        Returns:
        end of the match flag

      • getEndOfGames

        public boolean getEndOfGames()

      • announceNewGame

        public void announceNewGame()
        Operation announce new game. It is called by the referee to announce a new game on the start of the match or after a game ends.

      • declareGameWinner

        public boolean declareGameWinner​(int posRope)
        Operation declare game winner. It is called by the referee after a game has come to an end (either by trials or KO); determines the winner of the game using the position of the rope.
        Parameters:
        posRope - position of the rope at the end of the game

      • declareMatchWinner

        public void declareMatchWinner()
        Operation declare match winner. It is called by the referee after all games have been played; determines the winner of the match by comparing the scores of the teams.
